data.name: RPG Maker MV - Urban Slow Piano Vol.1
data.detailed_description:
TK Projects brings you 30 beautiful, emotional, slow piano pieces for the ultimate mood setting vibe and ambiance.

Songs featuring solo, unaccompanied piano in a range of styles including dramatic, drifting, melancholic, uplifting, pretty, tender, sweet and more. You will find all kinds of moods and scene setting music performed on piano for your RPG Maker MV games.

1. USP1_BGM01_Always On My Mind
2. USP1_BGM02_And I Love Her
3. USP1_BGM03_Beautiful Day
4. USP1_BGM04_You Belong With Me
5. USP1_BGM05_Call Me Maybe
6. USP1_BGM06_Bad Day
7. USP1_BGM07_Every Breath You Take
8. USP1_BGM08_Eyes On Me
9. USP1_BGM09_Hey Brother
10. USP1_BGM10_Close To You
11. USP1_BGM11_These Days
12. USP1_BGM12_Only Time
13. USP1_BGM13_I Want It
14. USP1_BGM14_Sweet Child
15. USP1_BGM15_Someone Like You
16. USP1_BGM16_Just Give Me A Reason
17. USP1_BGM17_You Belong With Me
18. USP1_BGM18_Just The Way You Are
19. USP1_BGM19_The Lazy Song
20. USP1_BGM20_The Way You Are
21. USP1_BGM21_Someone Like You
22. USP1_BGM22_What Makes You Beautiful
23. USP1_BGM23_Call Me Maybe
24. USP1_BGM24_Won't Go Home Without You
25. USP1_BGM25_Don't Know Why
26. USP1_BGM26_All My Loving
27. USP1_BGM27_Photograph
28. USP1_BGM28_We Don’t Talk Anymore
29. USP1_BGM29_Hold My Hand
30. USP1_BGM30_Story Of My Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
